name: Frimbly and the Cave of Wonders
name_original: Frimbly and the Cave of Wonders
description:
Create your own challenge with obstacles randomly picked out for you. Frimbly can run, jump, climb, and even wall jump his way to victory while avoiding the 3 hazards YOU as the player have picked out for Frimbly! The dice decides what section of the room each hazard must be placed at. GOOD LUCK and don’t die.

Control Frimbly with the WASD keys or arrow keys, and Space to Jump.

After the Tutorial Level, each level will begin with an obstacle menu, where you will have to drag the obstacles into the section each die shows!

Use your mouse to click and drag the obstacles where they are allowed.

Make sure they are in the right section, as shown by the die, and that they are also in the green spots, that show up as you hold the obstacle.

Finally click the OK button.

Story: Frimbly travels into the forbidden cave of wonders to find his dead father's ashes He does not find them and dies. 

Each Frimbly, is another Frimbly in a long line of Frimblies who try and find each of their father's ashes but then die.

It's a sad tale.
